int.name: enablePass
int.label: Enable Pass
int.help: Will setup the pass to be enabled, which means it can be used by the "PassResolve" node to setup your SceneGraph accordingly.

string.name: type
string.label: Type
string.help: Will setup the type of your pass.

string.name: prefix
string.label: Prefix
string.help: Will setup the prefix of your pass.

string.name: element
string.label: Element
string.help: Will setup the element of your pass.

string.name: suffix
string.label: Suffix
string.help: Will setup the suffix of your pass.

int.name: hideNonMatch
int.label: Hide Non-Matching Locations
int.help: Will hide the direct children of "/root/world" that are not matching any of the provided statement(s).

int.name: pruneNonMatch
int.label: Prune Non-Matching Locations
int.help: Will prune all the location(s) that are not matching any of the provided statement(s), i.e. a location that will never match anything even down the line of a recursive CEL statement for example.

string.name: global
string.label: Global
string.help: Will expose these locations(s) as visible in your SceneGraph and to the renderer.

string.name: cameras
string.label: Cameras
string.help: Will expose these location(s) as visible in your SceneGraph and to the renderer, if they are of type "camera".

string.name: lights
string.label: Lights
string.help: Will expose these location(s) as visible in your SceneGraph and to the renderer, if they are of type "light" or "rig".

string.name: hide
string.label: Hide
string.help: Will expose these locations(s) as hidden in your SceneGraph and to the renderer.

string.name: trace
string.label: Trace
string.help: Will expose these locations(s) exclusively to the indirect and transmission/shadow rays in your pass.

string.name: indirect
string.label: Indirect
string.help: Will expose these locations(s) exclusively to the indirect rays in your pass.

string.name: shadow
string.label: Shadow
string.help: Will expose these locations(s) exclusively to the transmission/shadow rays in your pass.

string.name: show
string.label: Show
string.help: Will expose these locations(s) to the camera rays in your pass.

string.name: hide
string.label: Hide
string.help: Will hide these locations(s) to the camera rays in your pass.

string.name: show
string.label: Show
string.help: Will expose these locations(s) to the indirect rays in your pass.

string.name: hide
string.label: Hide
string.help: Will hide these locations(s) to the indirect rays in your pass.

string.name: show
string.label: Show
string.help: Will expose these locations(s) to the transmission/shadow rays in your pass.

string.name: hide
string.label: Hide
string.help: Will hide these locations(s) to the transmission/shadow rays in your pass.

string.name: show
string.label: Show
string.help: Will expose these locations(s) as mattes in your pass.

string.name: hide
string.label: Hide
string.help: Will hide these locations(s) as mattes in your pass.
